titles.title: A bill to reinstate and extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the Gibson Dam.
A bill to reinstate and extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the Gibson Dam.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 115-100.

bill.summary:
(Sec.1)This bill authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC), upon request, to extend for up to six years the time period during which construction must commence on the Gibson Dam Hydroelectric Project located on the Sun River in Lewis, Clark, and Teton Counties, Montana.
Additionally, FERC may reinstate the construction license if it is expired.
